page.title: 13A WEEK AT SCHOOL
page.content: {CLASS ONE AT HOLLINGBOURNE SCHOOL} The school day begins at nine o'clock and finishes at three thirty with an hour and a half break for lunch. The day begins with registration followed by an assembly. On Friday we have a special "showing" assembly where each class shows the rest of the school the things it has been doing during the week. We do maths and English every day plus science, art and craft, music, physical education, topic work in history and geography, religious education and games. Sometimes we do some cooking or needlecraft and there are clubs for football, cricket gymnastics, athletics, judo, chess, drama, French and art and craft. On Friday afternoons the whole school goes swimming at Maidstone baths and every junior in the school can swim.
